item.title: Cryspen Welcomes Clement
item.description:
The team here at Cryspen is thrilled to welcome to our newest member, Clement!

Clement joins us fresh from his impressive journey as a PhD student at Inria Paris, where he was part of the Cambium team. His doctoral work focused on the formalization of the powerful but intricate typing system of OCaml modules. Under the supervision of Didier RÃ©my and Gabriel Radanne, Clement delved deep into the theoretical underpinnings of this masterpiece of language design.
